content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, I appreciate your interest in the apartment. As the landlord, I am eager to maximize my returns on investment. Can you propose a rental price that would be fair for both of us?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal, Hassan. However, I'm afraid I cannot accept that price. The apartment is only 25 square meters, and I believe a higher rental price would be more reasonable given its size. May I suggest we continue to discuss the rental price and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
900 dollars per month

I agree to the price of 900 dollars per month

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your revised proposal, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still not willing to accept that price. As the landlord, I need to consider my financial obligations and ensure that I am getting the best possible return on investment. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I must terminate our negotiation at this time. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
